name: Creamy Ranch Pasta Salad
ingredients: ½ cup of cherry tomatoes, halved
¼ cup of diced red onion
instructions: 1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked pasta, ranch dressing, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and fresh parsley.
2. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
3. Toss all the ingredients together until the pasta is evenly coated in the ranch dressing.
4. Serve immediately or refrigerate for later use.
description: Creamy Ranch Pasta Salad is a refreshing and delicious side dish that brings together cooked pasta, ranch dressing, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and fresh parsley. It's a perfect addition to any meal or a standalone light lunch.
